prompt. Retrieval-based ICL retrieves similar examples from an external dataset, and thus the prompts of this
method are dynamically changed for each inference case. Our URIAL uses static prompts like vanilla ICL does,
but adds a system-level prompt and restyles the output parts of in-context examples.
